front.div:
Abstract. We introduce the notion of implicit authentication
â€“ the ability to authenticate mobile users based on actions they
would carry out anyway. We develop a model for how to per-
form implicit authentication, and describe experiments aimed
at assessing the benefits of our techniques. Our preliminary
findings support that this is a meaningful approach, whether
used to increase usability or increase security.
